name: Bruce Lawm
description: Love is life so I will say I am here to find my one and only not here for two and what you want to know about me would be told, I have an open mind and very sincere I have not been on many dates but the few I had was face to face in the real which was not my match so what I want is a woman that we can take each other for what we are and also accept everything in our lives. I hope I find you or you find me.
